import math
import sys

def dist(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    return math.sqrt((x1 - x2)**2 + (y1 - y2)**2)

def angle(x, y):
    if x == 0:
        return math.pi / 2 if y > 0 else 3 * math.pi / 2
    return math.atan(y / x)
